title: Drawing On Family History, Julian Castro Hopes To Paint Texas Blue
teaser: The story of the changing demographics in Texas can, in many ways, be told through the family history of Julian Castro, the mayor of San Antonio. Mayor Castro discusses his story, as well as what Texas' expanding Hispanic population means for the state's political future.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
